EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These regulations amend the operation of S.I 385 of 2021 (Operation of certain 
indoor premises) to provide for both access to theatres and indoor cinemas for 
permitted persons with proof of immunity only.
